name: Dogfang Bite
summary: You can swing your beak to slash your foes when piercing attacks won't do.
description:
You can swing your beak to slash your foes when piercing attacks won't do. Your beak unarmed attack gains the versatile S weapon trait.Traits

Tengu: A creature with this trait is a member of the tengu ancestry. Tengus are humanoids who resemble birds. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tengus. An item with this trait is created and used by tengus.
